about_the_game:
🎃 Welcome to Spooky Night 🎃

Trust is scarce, betrayal thrives, and every decision can be your last. Spooky Night is the ultimate social deduction game, bringing friends and strangers together in a thrilling battle of wits and strategy. Will you expose the werewolves or fall victim to their cunning schemes?

🧩 How to Play

  • Day Phase: Talk with other players and vote to eliminate someone you think is a werewolf.

  • End of Day: The player with the most votes is eliminated and their role is revealed.

  • Night Phase: Werewolves attack, while villagers and other roles secretly use their abilities to protect, gather clues, or take action.

  • Win the Game:

    • Villagers win if all werewolves are eliminated.

    • Werewolves win if they equal or outnumber the villagers.

🎉 Why You’ll Love Spooky Night

Every round is a fresh, unpredictable adventure. With a variety of unique roles and endless player strategies, no two games are ever the same. Build trust (or break it!).

This game is entirely free to play! You'll earn rewards after every match and can unlock a wide range of character customizations. Purchasing the game allows you to acquire skins faster and expands your inventory.

short_description: Spooky Night is an online social deduction game of teamwork and betrayal! Uncover the werewolves among you before they wipe out the village. During the day, chat, deceive, and vote to eliminate a suspect. At night, use your role’s abilities to gather insights or strike. Can you survive?
